My name is Dr. Karen Shane, I am a veterinarian.
The best part about being a veterinarian is interacting with animals...
...and also being able to cure them and treat their illnesses.
Every day that I come to work I am rewarded with a new reason for why I became a veterinarian.
The most exciting thing about being a veterinarian is that no two days are the same.
I will see healthy puppies and kittens as well as patients that come in for surgeries.
